about_the_game:
Spotted is a mouse maze game, requiring agility and bravery. Travel along the river, being careful to only touch the water and not the riverbank. The more water you accumulate, the higher your score. As you progress, the pace will get faster, so try your best to keep up.

Features:

- Many colourful biomes to explore
- Procedurally generated mazes
- Multiplayer
- Cosmetic upgrades

Powerups:

Along the way, you will find powerups:
Extra life - Survive crashing into the wall
Time orbs - Slow the camera down
Invincibility - Allows you to touch anything for 10 seconds. Access pockets of loot that are out of reach normally!
Coins - Purchase cosmetic upgrades for your mouse

Multiplayer:

Connect up to 4 controllers and play with friends. Be careful not to bump your friends into the wall, unless of course that is your intention.

Shop:

Use the coins you collect ingame to purchase upgrades from the shop that change the way your mouse looks in shape, and also special effects like particles and trails.
